verses.verse: <WG1161>There was <WG2258> a man <WG444> of <WG1537> the Pharisees <WG5330>, named <WG3686> <WG846> Nicodemus <WG3530>, a ruler <WG758> of the Jews <WG2453>:

The same <WG3778> came <WG2064> to <WG4314> Jesus <WG2424> by night <WG3571>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Rabbi <WG4461>, we know <WG1492> that <WG3754> thou art <WG2064> a teacher <WG1320> come <WG2064> from <WG575> God <WG2316>: for <WG1063> no man <WG3762> can <WG1410> do <WG4160> these <WG5023> miracles <WG4592> that <WG3739> thou <WG4771> doest <WG4160>, except <WG3362> God <WG2316> be <WG5600> with <WG3326> him <WG846>.

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Verily <WG281> , verily <WG281> , I say <WG3004> unto thee <WG4671> , Except <WG3362> a man <WG5100> be born <WG1080> again <WG509> , he cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> see <WG1492> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> .

Nicodemus <WG3530> saith <WG3004> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, How <WG4459> can <WG1410> a man <WG444> be born <WG1080> when he is <WG5607> old <WG1088>? can <WG3361> <WG1410> he enter <WG1525> the second time <WG1208> into <WG1519> his <WG846> mother's <WG3384> womb <WG2836>, and <WG2532> be born <WG1080>?

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611>, Verily <WG281> , verily <WG281> , I say <WG3004> unto thee <WG4671> , Except <WG3362> a man <WG5100> be born <WG1080> of <WG1537> water <WG5204> and <WG2532> of the Spirit <WG4151> , he cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> enter <WG1525> into <WG1519> the kingdom <WG932> of God <WG2316> .
That which is born <WG1080> of <WG1537> the flesh <WG4561> is <WG2076> flesh <WG4561> ; and <WG2532> that which is born <WG1080> of <WG1537> the Spirit <WG4151> is <WG2076> spirit <WG4151> .
Marvel <WG2296> not <WG3361> that <WG3754> I said <WG2036> unto thee <WG4671> , Ye <WG5209> must <WG1163> be born <WG1080> again <WG509> .

The wind <WG4151> bloweth <WG4154> where <WG3699> it listeth <WG2309> , and <WG2532> thou hearest <WG191> the sound <WG5456> thereof <WG846> , but <WG235> canst <WG1492> not <WG3756> tell <WG1492> whence <WG4159> it cometh <WG2064> , and <WG2532> whither <WG4226> it goeth <WG5217> : so <WG3779> is <WG2076> every one <WG3956> that is born <WG1080> of <WG1537> the Spirit <WG4151> .
Nicodemus <WG3530> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, How <WG4459> can <WG1410> these things <WG5023> be <WG1096>?

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Art <WG1488> thou <WG4771> a master <WG1320> of Israel <WG2474> , and <WG2532> knowest <WG1097> not <WG3756> these things <WG5023> ?

Verily <WG281> , verily <WG281> , I say <WG3004> unto thee <WG4671> , We speak <WG2980> that <WG3754> <WG3739> we do know <WG1492> , and <WG2532> testify <WG3140> that <WG3739> we have seen <WG3708> ; and <WG2532> ye receive <WG2983> not <WG3756> our <WG2257> witness <WG3141> .

If <WG1487> I have told <WG2036> you <WG5213> earthly things <WG1919> , and <WG2532> ye believe <WG4100> not <WG3756> , how <WG4459> shall ye believe <WG4100> , if <WG1437> I tell <WG2036> you <WG5213> of heavenly things <WG2032> ?

And <WG2532> no man <WG3762> hath ascended up <WG305> to <WG1519> heaven <WG3772> , but <WG1508> he that came down <WG2597> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> , even the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> which <WG3588> is <WG5607> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> .

¶ And <WG2532> as <WG2531> Moses <WG3475> lifted up <WG5312> the serpent <WG3789> in <WG1722> the wilderness <WG2048> , even so <WG3779> must <WG1163> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> be lifted up <WG5312> :
That <WG3363> whosoever <WG3956> believeth <WG4100> in <WG1519> him <WG846> should <WG622> not <WG3363> perish <WG622> , but <WG235> have <WG2192> eternal <WG166> life <WG2222> .

¶ For <WG1063> God <WG2316> so <WG3779> loved <WG25> the world <WG2889> , that <WG5620> he gave <WG1325> his <WG846> only begotten <WG3439> Son <WG5207> , that <WG2443> whosoever <WG3956> believeth <WG4100> in <WG1519> him <WG846> should <WG622> not <WG3361> perish <WG622> , but <WG235> have <WG2192> everlasting <WG166> life <WG2222> .

For <WG1063> God <WG2316> sent <WG649> not <WG3756> his <WG846> Son <WG5207> into <WG1519> the world <WG2889> to <WG2443> condemn <WG2919> the world <WG2889> ; but <WG235> that <WG2443> the world <WG2889> through <WG1223> him <WG846> might be saved <WG4982> .

¶ He that believeth <WG4100> on <WG1519> him <WG846> is <WG2919> not <WG3756> condemned <WG2919> : but <WG1161> he that believeth <WG4100> not <WG3361> is condemned <WG2919> already <WG2235> , because <WG3754> he hath <WG4100> not <WG3361> believed <WG4100> in <WG1519> the name <WG3686> of the only begotten <WG3439> Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316> .

And <WG1161> this <WG3778> is <WG2076> the condemnation <WG2920> , that <WG3754> light <WG5457> is come <WG2064> into <WG1519> the world <WG2889> , and <WG2532> men <WG444> loved <WG25> darkness <WG4655> rather <WG3123> than <WG2228> light <WG5457> , because <WG1063> their <WG846> deeds <WG2041> were <WG2258> evil <WG4190> .

For <WG1063> every one <WG3956> that doeth <WG4238> evil <WG5337> hateth <WG3404> the light <WG5457> , neither <WG2532> <WG3756> cometh <WG2064> to <WG4314> the light <WG5457> , lest <WG3363> his <WG846> deeds <WG2041> should be reproved <WG1651> .

But <WG1161> he that doeth <WG4160> truth <WG225> cometh <WG2064> to <WG4314> the light <WG5457> , that <WG2443> his <WG846> deeds <WG2041> may be made manifest <WG5319> , that <WG3754> they are <WG2076> wrought <WG2038> in <WG1722> God <WG2316> .

¶ After <WG3326> these things <WG5023> came <WG2064> Jesus <WG2424> and <WG2532> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> into <WG1519> the land <WG1093> of Judaea <WG2449>; and <WG2532> there <WG1563> he tarried <WG1304> with <WG3326> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> baptized <WG907>.

¶ And <WG1161> John <WG2491> also <WG2532> was <WG2258> baptizing <WG907> in <WG1722> AEnon <WG137> near <WG1451> to Salim <WG4530>, because <WG3754> there was <WG2258> much <WG4183> water <WG5204> there <WG1563>: and <WG2532> they came <WG3854>, and <WG2532> were baptized <WG907>.
For <WG1063> John <WG2491> was <WG2258> not yet <WG3768> cast <WG906> into <WG1519> prison <WG5438>.
¶ Then <WG3767> there arose <WG1096> a question <WG2214> between <WG3326> some of <WG1537> John's <WG2491> disciples <WG3101> and the Jews <WG2453> about <WG4012> purifying <WG2512>.

And <WG2532> they came <WG2064> unto <WG4314> John <WG2491>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Rabbi <WG4461>, he <WG3739> that was <WG2258> with <WG3326> thee <WG4675> beyond <WG4008> Jordan <WG2446>, to whom <WG3739> thou <WG4771> barest witness <WG3140>, behold <WG2396>, the same <WG3778> baptizeth <WG907>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> men come <WG2064> to <WG4314> him <WG846>.

John <WG2491> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, A man <WG444> can <WG1410> <WG3756> receive <WG2983> nothing <WG3762>, except <WG3362> it be <WG5600> given <WG1325> him <WG846> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>.

Ye <WG5210> yourselves <WG846> bear <WG3140> me <WG3427> witness <WG3140>, that <WG3754> I said <WG2036>, I <WG1473> am <WG1510> not <WG3756> the Christ <WG5547>, but <WG235> that <WG3754> I am <WG1510> sent <WG649> before <WG1715> him <WG1565>.

He that hath <WG2192> the bride <WG3565> is <WG2076> the bridegroom <WG3566>: but <WG1161> the friend <WG5384> of the bridegroom <WG3566>, which <WG3588> standeth <WG2476> and <WG2532> heareth <WG191> him <WG846>, rejoiceth <WG5463> greatly <WG5479> because <WG1223> of the bridegroom's <WG3566> voice <WG5456>: this <WG3778> my <WG1699> joy <WG5479> therefore <WG3767> is fulfilled <WG4137>.
He <WG1565> must <WG1163> increase <WG837>, but <WG1161> I <WG1691> must decrease <WG1642>.

He that cometh <WG2064> from above <WG509> is <WG2076> above <WG1883> all <WG3956>: he that is <WG5607> of <WG1537> the earth <WG1093> is <WG2076> earthly <WG1537> <WG1093>, and <WG2532> speaketh <WG2980> of <WG1537> the earth <WG1093>: he that cometh <WG2064> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> is <WG2076> above <WG1883> all <WG3956>.
And <WG2532> what <WG3739> he hath seen <WG3708> and <WG2532> heard <WG191>, that <WG5124> he testifieth <WG3140>; and <WG2532> no man <WG3762> receiveth <WG2983> his <WG846> testimony <WG3141>.
He that hath received <WG2983> his <WG846> testimony <WG3141> hath set to his seal <WG4972> that <WG3754> God <WG2316> is <WG2076> true <WG227>.

For <WG1063> he whom <WG3739> God <WG2316> hath sent <WG649> speaketh <WG2980> the words <WG4487> of God <WG2316>: for <WG1063> God <WG2316> giveth <WG1325> not <WG3756> the Spirit <WG4151> by <WG1537> measure <WG3358> unto him.
The Father <WG3962> loveth <WG25> the Son <WG5207>, and <WG2532> hath given <WG1325> all things <WG3956> into <WG1722> his <WG846> hand <WG5495>.

He that believeth <WG4100> on <WG1519> the Son <WG5207> hath <WG2192> everlasting <WG166> life <WG2222>: and <WG1161> he that believeth not <WG544> the Son <WG5207> shall <WG3700> not <WG3756> see <WG3700> life <WG2222>; but <WG235> the wrath <WG3709> of God <WG2316> abideth <WG3306> on <WG1909> him <WG846>.
